level.heading: Issuance of animal license; collection of fees.
level.text: A licensed veterinarian is authorized to issue animal licenses and to collect the required fees and may collect an additional $2 for each license issued as reimbursement for administrative costs.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 8-1804.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-281
level.text: For Law 17-281, see notes following ยง 3-510.
